sections.heading: satisfied; financing statement; termination
sections.text: When a lien created under section 52-1201 is satisfied, any financing statement filed to perfect that lien shall be terminated in the manner and form provided in article 9, Uniform Commercial Code.SourceLaws 1988, LB 943, § 12;Laws 1999, LB 550, § 31;Laws

52-1205.Lien satisfied; financing statement; termination.

When a lien created under section 52-1201 is satisfied, any financing statement filed to perfect that lien shall be terminated in the manner and form provided in article 9, Uniform Commercial Code.

SourceLaws 1988, LB 943, § 12;Laws 1999, LB 550, § 31;Laws 2001, LB 54, § 22;Laws 2014, LB750, § 13.
